segments.text: This kitchen overflow is absolutely revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink onto the floor like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, drying her plate without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting filthy from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids raiding the cookie jar behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing on that flimsy stool, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies might crumble and mix with the water puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's eagerly waiting, hand up like a beggar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet doors swinging, inviting more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter's clear, but soon it'll be soaked too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight through the window makes the grime look worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That tidy garden outside contrasts this sloppy interior so much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unaware everyone seems to the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR
